FuncDef: The display device board reset command displays the reason for the board reset. The display device board reset command displays the reason for the board reset.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot number of a board or module to be displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Displays the reason for the reset of a subcard.
The value is a string of 1 to 4 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a card ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
